description.narrative: (Zambia): STEP-Up Zambia will continue assisting the Ministry of Education (MOE)~to improve learner performance in literacy through policy reform and capacity building initiatives led by local technical experts. With FY 2015 funds the activity will support the MOE to decentralize its management functions to: strengthen data management for decision making; enhance human resource management systems; support policy and research; build leadership at the school level; and institutionalize the management of HIV/AIDS workplace programs at all levels. The key to sustainability of this approach is ensuring that program support is integrated into the MOE's annual work plans and addresses Zambia's long-term development strategies. The U.S./MOE partnership will link resource allocation to learner performance so that more resources will reach schools, principals and teachers to enable them to apply innovative and locally appropriate methods for improved learning outcomes during STEP-Up implementation and beyond.
